cms.query.QueryText: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Cart.ShoppingCartID) FROM COM_ShoppingCart Cart INNER JOIN COM_ShoppingCartSKU CartSku ON Cart.ShoppingCartID= CartSku.ShoppingCartID WHERE Cart.ShoppingCartUserID=@ShoppingCartUserID AND Cart.ShoppingCartInventoryType=@ShoppingCartInventoryType AND ShoppingCartCampaignID= CASE WHEN ShoppingCartInventoryType=2 THEN @ShoppingCartCampaignID ELSE 0 END
